00015 // -- CLASS DESCRIPTION [IHFPDFWRAPPER] --

00033 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00034 BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss() : _fracGauss(0) {
00035   // Default Constructor:
00036   addComponents();
00037 }
00038 
00039 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00040 BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss(const char * theName,
00041                                    const char * theDesc,
00042                                    RooRealVar & dependent)  : _fracGauss(0) {
00043   // Initializing Constructor:
00044   addComponents();
00045   init(theName, theDesc, dependent);
00046 }

00049 BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::~BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss() {
00050   // Destructor:
00051   deleteFrac();
00052 }

00056 // Dummy copy constructor:
00057   cout << "BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss -- dummy copy constructor"
00058        << endl;

00062 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00063 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::init(const char * theName,
00064                             const char * theDesc,
00065                             RooRealVar & dependent) {
00066   // Initializer:
00067   _fracGauss = 0;
00068 
00069   SetName(theName);
00070   SetTitle(theDesc);
00071 
00072   baseInit(theName, theDesc);
00073   setDependent(dependent);
00074   initParameters();
00075 }
00076 
00077 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00078 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::setDependent(RooRealVar & dependent) {
00079   // Sets the dependent variable:
00080   _dependent = &dependent;
00081   _gauss.setDependent(dependent);
00082   _bifur.setDependent(dependent);
00083 
00084   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00085 }
00086 
00087 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00088 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::initParameters() {
00089   // Initializes the contained RRV's and PDF wrappers:
00090   _fracGauss = new RooRealVar(GetName() + TString(".fracGauss"),
00091                               GetTitle () + TString(" fracGauss"),
00092                               0.8, 0, 1);
00093 
00094   _fracGauss->setError(0.02);
00095 
00096   _gauss.init(GetName() + TString(".gauss"), 
00097               GetTitle() + TString(" Gauss"), 
00098               *_dependent);
00099 
00100   _bifur.init(GetName() + TString(".bifur"), 
00101               GetTitle() + TString(" Bifurcated Gauss"), 
00102               *_dependent);
00103 }
00104 
00105 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00106 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::createPdf() {
00107   // Builds the PDF. The PDFs of the contained wrappers are automatically built
00108   _thePdf = new RooAddPdf(GetName() + TString(".thePdf"), 
00109                           GetTitle() + TString(" thePdf"), 
00110                           *_gauss.getPdf(), 
00111                           *_bifur.getPdf(),
00112                           *_fracGauss);
00113 
00114   setIsValid(kTRUE);
00115 }
00116 
00117 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00118 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::deleteFrac() {
00119   // Deletes pointers:
00120   setIsValid(kFALSE);
00121   if ( _fracGauss != 0 )   delete _fracGauss;
00122 }
00123 
00124 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00125 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::addComponents() {
00126   // Adds the wrappers to the composite's list:
00127   addComponent(_gauss);
00128   addComponent(_bifur);
00129 }
00130 
00131 //--------------------------------------------------------------
00132 void BdkPdfBifurGaussGauss::linkParameters(RooRealVar * b1,
00133                                            RooRealVar * s1,
00134                                            RooRealVar * b2, 
00135                                            RooRealVar * s2l,
00136                                            RooRealVar * s2r,
00137                                            RooRealVar * fracGauss) {
00138   // Copies RRV pointers:
00139   _gauss.linkResolution(b1, s1);
00140   _bifur.linkParameters(b2, s2l, s2r);
00141 
00142   if (0 != fracGauss) {
00143     _fracGauss = fracGauss;
00144     setIsValid(kFALSE);
00145   }
00146 }
